import React from 'react'; import {AiFillFacebook} from 'react-icons/ai'; import GoogleImg from '../images/btn_google_light.svg' import { useState } from 'react'; function Register() { const [gender, setGender] = useState(""); function handelActiveGender(e){ console.log(document.querySelector("#female")); setGender(e.target.className); removeActive(); addActive(e.target.className); } function removeActive(){ const female= document.getElementsByClassName("female"); const male = document.getElementsByClassName("male"); if(female.classList.contains("active")){ female.classList.remove("active") } if(male.classList.contains("active")){ male.classList.remove("active") } } function addActive(activeGender){ document.getElementsByClassName(activeGender).classList.add("active"); } return (
